pages.text: TFC's Quern has been replaced with Create's Millstone, however, it retains all functionality from it. It is a device to grind items and can be used to make powders, $(l:mechanics/dye)dyes$(), and some other items.$(br2)Ore powders can be smelted, and, when made with a Millstone, have the same yield as the ore itself, just divided by 5.

Additionally, ore powder can be condensed into blocks for more space efficiency, as these blocks can also be melted. Ore powders also prevent the production of $(thing)Slag$() when melting ores.$(br2)To have an even higher yield, $(thing)Crushing Wheels$() must be used.
